channel.title: Client keeps freezing when other players log in?
channel.description:
me and my freind play on my server for tests and when he logs in i freeze adn have to reopen client, and when i log in he freezes.
i use 3.2 client that i downloaded, and he uses the web client, and help?

item.title: Client keeps freezing when other players log in?

item.description:
@iatchi1019 wrote:

maybe 1 of u have silab items on?
